TimeDepth: around 500 AD split of daughter languages (andersen2003language)
between one and three thousand years ago (enfield2013linguistic)

Homeland: Somewhere on the Himalayan plateau, where the great rivers of East and Southeast Asia (including the Yellow, Yangtze, Mekong, Brahmaputra, Salween, and Irrawaddy) have their source

TimeDepth: 3,500 to 3,800 for the split of South and North Iroquoian (lounsbury1961iroquois)
